ERROR_NOT_LOGGED_IN.message: User has no token, please login to recive a new token!

ERROR_CANNOT_FIND_USER.message: Cannot find a user with the specified data.

ERROR_INVALID_TOKEN.message: You've been logged out! Please, login again!

ERROR_INVALID_AUTHORIZATION_HEADER.message: Invalid authorization header. Format must be 'Bearer token'.
